---
title: "`r paste0('NM Summary ', Sys.info()[['user']], ' ', Sys.time())`"
output: 
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_float:
      collapsed: false
    toc_depth: 3
params: 
  figurelist: "`r list()`"
  tablelist: "`r list()`"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

# Figures

## Boxplots

```{r, results="asis"}

for (i in 1:length(params$figurelist$boxplots)) {
  
  writeLines("\n")
  
  writeLines(paste0("### ", names(params$figurelist$boxplots)[i]))
  
  print(params$figurelist$boxplots[[i]])
  
  writeLines("\n")
}

```

## Barplots

```{r, results="asis"}

for (i in 1:length(params$figurelist$barplots)) {
  
  writeLines("\n")
  
  writeLines(paste0("### ", names(params$figurelist$barplots)[i]))
  
  print(params$figurelist$barplots[[i]])
  
  writeLines("\n")
}

```

# Tables

## Covariates 

```{r, results="asis"}

for (i in 1:length(params$tablelist$covariates)) {

  writeLines("\n")
  
  writeLines(paste0("### ", names(params$tablelist$covariates)[i]))

  print(htmltools::tagList(gt::gt(params$tablelist$covariates[[i]])))

  writeLines("\n")
}

```

## Miscellaneous 

```{r, results='asis'}

for (i in 1:length(params$tablelist$misc)) {

  writeLines("\n")
  
  writeLines(paste0("### ", names(params$tablelist$misc)[i]))

  print(htmltools::tagList(gt::gt(params$tablelist$misc[[i]])))

  writeLines("\n")
}

```
